Lamidi Olonade Fakeye (1925 - December 25, 2009) bụ onye Naijiria na-akpụ ihe na onye agụmakwụkwọ nke ọgbọ nke ise.
A mụrụ Fakeye na 1925 na Ila Orangun, Nigeria
O bu ụzọ kpụọ ihe ọkpụkpụ na 1938 n'oge ahụ ọ bụ onye na-amụ ihe n'aka nna ya. N'afọ 1949, ọ malitere ịbụ onye na-amụ ihe na onye na-ese ihe n'aka George Bamidele Arowoogun.
N'afọ 1955, ọ gara rụọ ọrụ na Holy Cross Primary School na Lagos, Nigeria dị ka onye nkuzi nka
Ihe ngosi nke mbụ ya bụ n'afọ 1960 nke e mere na British Council na Nigeria
N'afọ 1962, a kpọrọ ya onye na-ese ihe na Mahadum Western Michigan dị na Kalamazoo, Michigan

Ka ọ na-erule afọ 1964, a họpụtara ya dịka onye isi oche nke Society of Professional Artists of Nigeria, n'otu afọ ahụ ihe ngosi ya mepere na United States Information Service na Nigeria. N'afọ 1971, e nwere ihe ngosi nke gosipụtara ọgbọ atọ nke ndị na-ese osisi Fakeye na Ibadan, Nigeria
A họpụtara ya na ngalaba nke Mahadum Ife na 1978
N'afọ 1989, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ese ihe na ọtụtụ mahadum dị n'obodo ndị dị ka Cleveland na Pittsburgh

O bipụtara akụkọ ndụ ya na 1996 ma nwee ihe ngosi na Hope College na Holland, Michigan. E mere ihe ngosi ngosi nke ọrụ ndụ ya na Smithsonian na 1999 na ụfọdụ n'ime ihe osise ya bụ Johfrim Art and Design Studio.
1989: E nyere Oyo State, Nigeria, Special Merit Award 1999: A họpụtara Kellogg Visiting Artist for Michigan 2008: A kpọrọ ya bụ UNESCO Living Human Treasure.
N'afọ 2011, e mere ihe nkiri banyere ndụ Fakeye nke a na-akpọ Lamidi Olonade Fakeye: The Life of a Master Carver nke Joe Reese duziri, nke Elizabeth Heery dere.
Fakeye nwụrụ na Disemba 25, 2009 na Ile-Ife, Nigeria
Ọnwụ ya bụ n'ihi nsogbu ndị sochiri ịwa ahụ prostate-cancer.
